# scribblr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`scribblr` is an RStudio Addin providing a minimalist notepad for project-related notetaking in RStudio. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of \code{scribblr} from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("vgherard/scribblr")
```
